LanguageData.MakePowerArm.label: craft power arm
LanguageData.MakePowerArm.description: Attaching a power claw to a bionic arm is not as easy as it sounds, but damn is it awesome! Lethal and effective in combat.\n\nDo not install on an unstable subject, as this might cause unwanted death and destruction.

LanguageData.MakeNeurostimulator.label: Create neurostimulator
LanguageData.MakeNeurostimulator.description:
Creates a neurostimulator. Requires an AI persona core.

Highly advanced brain implant that attempts to enhance the consciousness of the subject. Comes with numerous side effects like headaches and loss of language.

Some personality changes may occur. Only recommended for brain damaged colonists.
LanguageData.MakeHyporegulator.label: Create hyporegulator
LanguageData.MakeHyporegulator.description: Creates a hyporegulator. Requires an AI persona core.\n\nHighly advanced brain implant that attempts to enhance the mental and physical resilience of the subject. The implant is placed into the hypothalamus which increases the effectiveness of the HPA axis and the body's thermoregulation.
LanguageData.MakeCortexaugmentor.label: Create cortexaugmentor
LanguageData.MakeCortexaugmentor.description: Creates a cortexaugmentor. Requires an AI persona core.\n\nHighly advanced brain implant that attempts to enhance the general intelligence of the subject. The implant is placed into the prefrontal cortex which increases cognitive abilities such as language and learning speed.
LanguageData.MakeJoywire.label: Craft joywire
LanguageData.MakeJoywire.description: Creates a joywire. Needs gold and plasteel for high quality circuitry.
LanguageData.MakePainstopper.label: Craft painstopper
LanguageData.MakePainstopper.description: Creates a painstopper implant. Needs gold and plasteel for high quality circuitry.
